tv.ouya.console.api
Class OuyaActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  tv.ouya.console.api.OuyaActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class OuyaActivity
extends android.app.Activity

Extend the OuyaActivity and your onGenericMotionEvent, onKeyUp, and onKeyDown events will behave as though your input device is an OuyaController. Input events will remap supported controllers to an OuyaController layout. The input remapping is data driven and will support new devices without the need to recompile the application or game.

Field Summary
static int FLAG_SKIP_HIDE_NAV_BAR
          Flag to have OuyaActivity not call hideNavigationBar.
static int FLAG_SKIP_OUYACONTROLLER_DISPATCH
          Flag to have OuyaActivity call OuyaInputMapper.setEnableControllerDispatch(false) (this will not keep OuyaController classes in sync).
static int FLAG_SKIP_OUYAINPUTMAPPER_DISPATCHES
          Flag to have OuyaActivity not use the OuyaInputMapper for dispatching events (this will disable automatic button remapping).
static int FLAG_SKIP_TAKE_KEYS
          Flag to have OuyaActivity not call takeKeyEvents.
static int FLAGS_DEFAULT
          Default flags value.

dispatchKeyEvent

public boolean dispatchKeyEvent(android.view.KeyEvent keyEvent)
Dispatch KeyEvents to the OuyaInputMapper. The remapped input will return to the activity with onGenericMotionEvent, onKeyDown, and onKeyUp events. Be sure to use the remapped input from the above events instead of the KeyEvent passed to this method that has not been remapped yet.

Specified by:
dispatchKeyEvent in interface android.view.Window.Callback
Overrides:
dispatchKeyEvent in class android.app.Activity
Parameters:
keyEvent - passed passed to the OuyaInputMapper

dispatchGenericMotionEvent

public boolean dispatchGenericMotionEvent(android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent)
Dispatch MotionEvents to the OuyaInputMapper. The remapped input will return to the activity with onGenericMotionEvent, onKeyDown, and onKeyUp events. Be sure to use the remapped input from the above events instead of the MotionEvent passed to this method that has not been remapped yet.

Specified by:
dispatchGenericMotionEvent in interface android.view.Window.Callback
Overrides:
dispatchGenericMotionEvent in class android.app.Activity
Parameters:
motionEvent - passed passed to the OuyaInputMapper
